2026-02-03PCHBroadcasting ActRe-appointment of a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting CorporationRe-appointment of Rita Shelton Deverell, C.M., of Coldwater, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years.N/A
subject: Re-appointment of a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
precis: Re-appointment of Rita Shelton Deverell, C.M., of Coldwater, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years.
